isMin: The {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be at least {constraints.0}, ow and {message}
isMinLength: The {property} must be at least {min} digits
isMax: The {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be less than {constraints.0}, ow and {message}
isMaxLength: The {property} must not be greater than {max} digits
isEnum: The {property} must be a valid enum value
